Introduction
This topic contains policies and procedures for requesting medical examinations for claims for SC for COVID-19, including
evidence needed to request an examination
requesting medical opinions to confirm a COVID-19 diagnosis
, and
guidelines for examinations
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10 - Presumptive Service Connection (SC) for Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 10, Section None
